name: Scarlet Tower
description:
Key Features:
- Heroes with unique weapons, abilities, and talents
- Over 70 weapons
- Weapon fusion system
- Over 200 passive abilities for building your build
- Racial Abilities
- Pets
- Runes
- Bestiary
- Over 20 hours of content
- Bosses with unique abilities
- Thousands of unlockables
- Long character progression
- Supports Ultrawide
- Day and Night Cycle
- Endless Mode
intro: Hunt during the day, be hunted during the Night! Scarlet Tower is a gothic horror casual game with roguelike and RPG elements, like talent trees, classes, familiars and more!
